name: ConsentForm
title: Please click on each statement to confirm that you agree before you proceed to the survey.
In which country do you currently reside?
How would you describe your understanding and fluency in English?
Please indicate if you currently work for a small or medium enterprise (SME)?
Please indicate in the sector you work in?
Please indicate the estimated annual turnover of your company (Vietnamese Dong)
Please indicate your level of agreement with the following statements **in the context of the business practices [design] in the organisation where you are employed**
Our product designs aim to extend the product life and promote extended use/reuse of materials and products
Our product designs consider regenerative/bio-degradable materials
We aim to design our products for reuse, recycle and remanufacture
Our product designs consider eco-friendly manufacturing practises
Our product design considers complete elimination of hazardous products
Please indicate your role/ designation in the SME (organisation) you are employed
Please indicate if your role involve managing other people
Please indicate your level of agreement with the following statements **in the context of the business practices** [procurement] in the **organisation where you are employed**
We rate our suppliers’ compliances with environmental legislation
We apply environmental criteria in the selection of suppliers along with quality, cost and time
We provide design specifications to suppliers with environmental requirements
We apply social criteria in the selection of suppliers along with quality, cost and time
We evaluate environmental risk and responsibilities with suppliers
Please indicate your level of agreement with the following statements **in the context of the business** practices [manufacturing/production/operations] in the **organisation where you are employed**
We have practices for efficient handling of raw materials, work-in-progress and finished products in the production processes
We use renewable energy to reduce impact on environment
We have maintenance practises that enhance the life of facilities, machineries and equipment
We redefine operation and production processes to reduce impact on environment
Our manufacturing processes consider zero waste policy
We have energy efficient manufacturing and production facilities
Please indicate your level of agreement with the following statements **in the context of the business** practices [resource consumption] in the **organisation where you are employed**
We have practices for reducing the consumption of energy in the production processes
We have designed processes to efficiently decrease carbon footprint
We have practices and policies to use green and sustainable fuels
We employ just in time for eco-friendly logistics practices
We have designed processes for responsible and sustainable consumption of raw materials
Please indicate your level of agreement with the following statements **in the context of the business** practices [Reduce] in the **organisation where you are employed**
We have ways to decrease the usage of non-recyclable raw materials in our processes
We have replaced non-recyclable raw materials with renewable, recyclable or biodegradable inputs
We work with clients/suppliers for ecological design of products/services
We have policies and processes to reduce waste generated by suppliers
We have policies and processes to reduce hazardous manufacturing process and materials
We have practices to reduce impact on environment (water, air and noise pollution)
Please indicate your level of agreement with the following statements **in the context of the business** practices [reuse] in the **organisation where you are employed**
We have introduced alternative ways to use our products once they have served their initial purpose
We have found new revenue streams for products/services after they have served their initial purpose
We work with our suppliers to find ways to reintroduce end-of-life items into our supply chain or someone else’s supply chain
During the design stage we consider the possibility to reuse products after they have served their initial purpose
We have processes with increase the percentage of left-over raw materials reused
Our policies ensure that we use treatments and filtrations to extend the use of industrial resources (such as oils, acids, lubricants)
Please indicate your level of agreement with the following statements **in the context of the business** practices [recycle] in the **organisation where you are employed**
We have processes (reverse logistics) to collect from customer and recycle
We are using recycled materials as inputs in our processes
We consider the potential of recycling at the design stage of our products/services
We recycle the industrial material and waste we generate from our processes (chemicals, oils, packaging, plastics and any other non-biodegradable materials involved)
We have policy and practices in place to dispose machineries and equipment on time
We use recyclable or reusable packaging/containers in logistical processes
Please indicate your level of agreement with the following statements in the context of the operational performance of your organisation, where you are employed
We have improved our quality of products and services
We have improved our process efficiency
We have reduced our operation costs in recent years
We have improved green/eco design
We have improved green/eco packaging
We have achieved resource efficiency across our processes
Please indicate your level of agreement with the following statements in the context of the economic performance of your organisation, where you are employed
We have improved our productivity in recent years
We have improved our turnover in recent years
We have reduced our manufacturing costs in recent years
Our business is experiencing growth in recent years
We have increased average return on net assets from green products
We have reduced Inventory carrying cost
We have reduced Cost of transportation and handling
Please indicate your level of agreement with the following statements in the context of the environmental performance of your organisation, where you are employed
We have reduced business waste across our processes
We have achieved energy efficiency across our processes
We have improved compliance with environmental standards
We have decreased carbon emissions
We increased revenue from green products and practices
Please indicate your level of agreement with the following statements in the context of the social performance of your organisation, where you are employed
We have improved our relationship with the community and stakeholders in recent years
We have improved work safety in recent years
We have improved work environment in recent years
We have improved living quality of surrounding community in recent years
We have commitment from employees and managers towards incorporating environmental management
We have created jobs to support the community and thus contributed to nation’s entrepreneurial growth.
Please indicate your level of agreement with the following statements in the context of the marketing performance of your organisation, where you are employed
Our level of customer loyalty has increased in recent years
Our level of customer satisfaction has increased in recent years
We have improved collaboration/cooperation with customers
We have increased consumer awareness about green practices
We have increased budget on green marketing activities
Please indicate your level of agreement with the following statements in the context of the organisational performance of your organisation, where you are employed
We have issued Research and Development budgets for environmentally friendly and socially responsible business processes and practices
Our Corporate Socially Responsible activities have increased our Green reputation
We have a clear environmental and business goals policy statement and mandate
We have training for workers linked to circular economy practices
We have cross functional teams for environmental management and auditing
We publicly share activity reports on environmental and social performance with customers, suppliers and trading partners
Please indicate your level of agreement with the following statements in the context of the culture within the organisation, where you are employed
In my organisation significant time is spent planning and thinking things through
Communication from management is clear, transparent and frequent
Teams, departments coordinate and cooperate to provide the best service
In my organisation, there is strong emphasis on employee mental health and well-being
In my organisation we use job rotation to increase a broad, global vision of employees relative to firm activity.
In my organisation we emphasise direct quality control instead of control afterwards (do things correctly the first time)
In my organisation we apply vertical extension of responsibilities (job enrichment), that is, obtain more decision-making authority over activities to be performed.

In my organisation we apply horizontal extension of responsibilities (job enlargement), that is, we are able to perform a broader repertoire of activities (job rotation, increase interchangeability of positions).
My organisation has increased the proportion of employee recommendations and proposes for improvement in quality, social and environment health and safety performance
Please indicate **how satisfied are you about the following aspects of your job**
Physical working conditions
Freedom to choose your own method of working
Collaborating with Your colleagues and fellow workers
Recognition you get for good work
Amount of responsibility you are given
Your remuneration, i.e. income
Opportunity to use your abilities
Your hours of work
Amount of variety in your job
Level of training received
Leadership or organisational decision-making
Level of support to cope with work pressure
Signposting to cope with health and wellbeing issues
Level of inclusivity
Discussion with your line manager about mental health and wellbeing
Discussion of job progression and achievements
Meaningfulness of your job
Taking everything into consideration, how do you feel about your job?
Please indicate the level of agreement with the following statements in the context of **factors influencing practices and policies employed by your organisation to adopt Circular Economy**
The government regulations and law requires our firm to abide by environmentally friendly and socially responsible business processes and practices
The industry associations policies requires our firm to follow environmentally friendly and socially responsible business processes and practices
Our suppliers, trade partners and consumers want us to be environmentally sustainable and socially responsible in our business practices and policies
Our competitors who have adopted Circular Economy practices have greatly benefitted.
Business cases employing circular economy demonstrate how it can help achieve sustainability across the processes – economic, social and environment
Please indicate the level of agreement with the following statements in the context of **analytics and technology capability your organisation to adopt Circular Economy**
My organisation can cope with the unpredictable trajectory of technology advances
We use digital platforms and/or contemporary technology to monitor and track products in the value chain
We use digital platforms and/or contemporary technology to optimize resource utilization, e.g. using waste as a resource, optimal energy consumption
We use digital platforms and/or contemporary technology to attract new customers and understand their evolving needs
We use digital platforms and/or contemporary technology for making decisions to support reuse and recycling practices
We use digital platforms and/or contemporary technology for virtualisation of digital channels
We use digital platforms and information management systems to make green decisions
We use digital platforms and analytics for monitoring the environmental information (such as toxicity, energy used water used, air pollution)
Please indicate the level of agreement with the following statements in the context of **dynamic capability your organisation to adopt Circular Economy**
We have been able to predict many of the key changes taking place in our competitive environment
We have reconfigured business processes considering environmental issues to remain competitive in the market
We are able to satisfy evolving needs of consumers and trade partners in the context of environmentally friendly choices
We are able to satisfy evolving needs of consumers and trade partners in the context of socially friendly practices
We have modified our resource base to integrate green practices and policies considering uncertain and unstable market dynamics
We have extended our knowledge base to employ lean management in uncertain volatile market conditions
We are capable of making agile decisions to withstand complex market and trade dynamics
We have the absorptive capacity to make business productive decisions considering ambiguous information, regulations and policies pertaining to adoption of circular economy
Please indicate the level of agreement with the following statements in the context of **COVID-19 impact your organisation to adopt Circular Economy**
Communication from government regarding COVID has enabled our organisation has enabled us to be productive
My organisation has the technical and human resources to adapt to the evolving needs during COVID
My organisation has fully changed its business processes - structural and operational as a result of COVID, in line with circular economy philosophy
My organisation has repurposed its business processes - structural and operational as a result of COVID, in line with circular economy philosophy
My organisation has supported the mental health and well-being of employees during COVID, in line with circular economy philosophy
My organisation has provided all the necessary training to employees during COVID to enhance their performance, in line with circular economy philosophy
My organisation has implemented clear rules of social distancing at workplace
Social distancing has reduced employee productivity at work
My organisation has been resilient to the negative impact of COVID on business operations and productivity, in line with employing circular economy practices
My organisation has provided employees with Personal Protective Equipment during COVID to maintain health and safety
Working with wearing Personal Protective Equipment during COVID has substantially reduced productivity at work
My company's suppliers have been resilient in their operations during COVID
During the COVID-19, my organisation was able to fulfil the consumer demands
During the COVID-19, my organisation has engaged in product innovation through environmentally friendly and socially responsible practices
COVID-19 impact has made it difficult to adopt environmentally friendly practices
COVID-19 impact has put us behind to adopt circular economy practices and limited strategic initiatives from my organisation
My governments response to COVID19 has helped my organisation to remain productive and competitive in the market
During the COVID-19, my organisation has engaged in process innovation through environmentally friendly and socially responsible practices
During the COVID-19, my organisation has engaged with and supported community to aid COVID 19 response for the society

**Considering the sources of information about COVID19 that your organisation tends to engage with on a regular basis to develop business strategies, please indicate from the list below the most impactful channels**
Hard copy Printed Media - News papers and magazines
Online news papers, magazines
TV and Radio News programmes
online Podcasts & YouTube
Social media
Vietnamese Government website
Online documentation from other policy makers
Online documentation from government in other countries
Information from business competitors - posted online
Reaching out to other businesses in your country
Information from businesses in other countries - posted online
Online content posted by higher education researchers in Vietnam
Online content posted by higher education researchers from other countries
Please indicate the level of agreement with the following statements - **innovation in your organisation**
On average, each year my organisation introduces more new products/services than our key competitors
Senior management support the introduction of innovative practices/products/services
Our organisation is often consulted by other organizations for advice and information.

Please indicate the level of agreement with the following statements **concerning risk management in your organisation**

My organisation performs period reviews of risks associated with physical and digital assets
My organisation has digital tools and technical resources to monitor, analyse and predict risks

In terms of employing and adopting circular economy practices, which of the following category best fits your current company strategy

In your own words, please briefly suggest THREE-FIVE things that will facilitate towards adopting and implementing circular economy practices in your organisation and/or Vietnam. You can write your responses in your own language (Vietnamese)
